headline: HII to Host Third Quarter Earnings Conference Call and Webcast on Oct. 30
summary: NEWPORT NEWS, Va., Oct. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) will release its third quarter 2025 financial results on Thursday, Oct. 30 and host an earnings conference call at 9 a.m. Eastern time the same day. The call will be webcast live on HII’s website: https://www.hii.com/. HII participants will include Chris Kastner, president and CEO, and Tom Stiehle, executive vice president and chief financial officer. Their remarks will be supplemented by a series of slides appearing on the com
